Talk01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting>Hey, Link! <sp:5:1:0>Thanks to you, life in Rito
Village is slowly getting back to normal.<sp:0:4:0>I've been looking into leads about
Princess Zelda, and I'll let you know right
away if any of them go somewhere!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>Oh, yeah, one other thing! <sp:5:1:0>I don't think
this has anything to do with where the
princess went, but...
Talk06:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Harth asked me to help him sort through
some ancient literature.<sp:0:4:0>You'll never believe what I found written
in one of his books!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01>"Sturnida, <sp:5:0:0>Goflam's, <sp:5:0:0>and Sherfin's. <sp:5:1:0>Hidden
treasure sleeps in the center of the three
secret hot springs in the mountains.<sp:0:4:0>"Guide the three waters to that place.
When it fills, <sp:5:0:0>the slumbering treasure
will awaken once more."<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>There's got to be something good waiting
for whoever solves the riddle, right?!
Talk06_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>Oh yeah, one other thing!<sp:5:1:0> Something else
came up that I wanted to ask you about.
Talk07:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Secret hot springs, huh? I've been to
<clr:0000>Sturnida Secret Hot Spring<clr:ffff> a few times.
It's northwest of Rito Village.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>It's the best! A quick soak is enough to
heal your wounds in the blink of an eye.
It keeps you from freezing too.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>But I dunno about the others. The Hebra
Mountains are a big place. I'm not sure
we could cover all of them.<sp:0:4:0>But that slumbering treasure is pretty
tempting...<sp:5:0:0>if only we could find it.
Talk03:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>"Sturnida, <sp:5:0:0>Goflam's, <sp:5:0:0>and Sherfin's. <sp:5:1:0>Hidden
treasure sleeps in the center of the three
secret hot springs in the mountains.<sp:0:4:0>"Guide the three waters to that place.
When it fills, <sp:5:0:0>the slumbering treasure
will awaken once more." Hmm.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>I know about the <clr:0000>Sturnida secret hot
spring<clr:ffff> northwest of the village, but the
other ones I'm not too familiar with.<sp:0:4:0>Without a <clr:0000>map<clr:ffff> that shows the Hebra
Mountains from high in the sky, I don't
see how you'd ever find them.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>"Slumbering treasure," huh? <sp:5:0:0>Where could
it be?
Talk01_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>I've been looking into leads about
Princess Zelda, and I'll let you know right
away if any of them go somewhere!<sp:0:4:0>Oh, yeah, one other thing! <sp:5:1:0>I don't think
this has anything to do with where the
princess went, but...
Talk05:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting>Hey, Link! <sp:5:1:0>Life in Rito Village is just about
back to normal now.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_01>Who could have guessed that the blizzard
that hit Rito Village was the work of the
Demon King?<sp:0:4:0>Or that Princess Zelda was sent to the
world of the past? No wonder we couldn't
find her.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive_01>The big thing left to do now is to round
up all the information we can find on
<clr:0000>the fifth sage<clr:ffff>.
I'll do my part to turn up whatever I can
about ruins from the age of legends!
